entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as the one Harry is supposed to have learned Occlumency from.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: A person being punished, but their identity and relationship to Harry are not specified.

relationships.description: Harry is being supervised by Dumbledore in Occlumency lessons.
The nature of Harry's relationship with Avery is not specified, but it seems to be related to punishment.
Ron and Hermione are friends and classmates of Harry.
Harry and Ron are close friends.
